alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 9:31PM CDT until September 10 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR EASTERN HANSFORD AND WESTERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 931 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Waka, or 7 miles east of Spearman, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 930 PM CDT, a 62 mph wind gust was recorded at the Spearman airport. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Spearman, Waka, and Farnsworth. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
